markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Disrupting Strikes](/Feats.aspx?ID=2712) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Ghost Eater](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=92)

**Prerequisites**
[Ghost Eater Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2710)

</column>

---

You call forth positive energy from within to help you destroy undead. Your weapon and unarmed Strikes gain the effects of a [_disrupting_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=294) property rune until the start of your next turn.

 If you're 14th level or higher, your Strikes instead gain the effects of a _greater disrupting_ property rune. The DC for the rune's effect is equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.
name: Disrupting Strikes
